problem_names:
lemma measure_wf:
  assumes "wf (r :: ('a \<times> 'a) set)"
  assumes "r' = { (x,y). ((m x),(m y)) \<in> r }"
  shows "wf r'"

lemma finite_proj_wf:
  assumes "finite E"
  assumes "x \<in> E"
  assumes "acyclic r"
  shows "(\<exists> y. y \<in> E \<and> (\<forall> z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E))"
translations:
lemma measure_wf:
  assumes "wf (r :: ('a \<times> 'a) set)"
  assumes "r' = { (x,y). ((m x),(m y)) \<in> r }"
  shows "wf r'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf r'
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf r'
have "(\<forall>Q::'b set. \<forall>x:: 'b. x\<in>Q \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>z\<in>Q. \<forall>y. (y,z)\<in> r' --> y\<notin>Q))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<longrightarrow>
       (\<exists>z\<in>Q.
           \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q)
proof  ((rule allI)+,(rule impI))

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
fix Q:: "'b set"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
fix x:: 'b

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
assume "x\<in>Q"

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
let ?Q' = "(m ` Q)"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
from \<open>x \<in> Q\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> Q
have Q'_not_empty: "m x \<in> ?Q'"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m x \<in> m ` Q
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  m x \<in> m ` Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
from assms(1) and Q'_not_empty

proof (chain)
picking this:
  wf r
  m x \<in> m ` Q

obtain z' where "z' \<in> ?Q'" and z'min: "\<forall>y. (y,z')\<in> r 
      \<longrightarrow> y\<notin>?Q'"

proof (prove)
using this:
  wf r
  m x \<in> m ` Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z'.
        \<lbrakk>z' \<in> m ` Q;
         \<forall>y.
            (y, z') \<in> r \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> m ` Q\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using wf_eq_minimal [of r]

proof (prove)
using this:
  wf r
  m x \<in> m ` Q
  wf r =
  (\<forall>Q x.
      x \<in> Q \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z'.
        \<lbrakk>z' \<in> m ` Q;
         \<forall>y.
            (y, z') \<in> r \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> m ` Q\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  z' \<in> m ` Q
  \<forall>y. (y, z') \<in> r \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> m ` Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
from \<open>z' \<in> ?Q'\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  z' \<in> m ` Q
obtain z where "z' = (m z)" and "z \<in> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  z' \<in> m ` Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z.
        \<lbrakk>z' = m z; z \<in> Q\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  z' = m z
  z \<in> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
have "\<forall>y. (y,z)\<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y\<notin>Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
proof ((rule allI),(rule impI))

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<Longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
fix y

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<Longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
assume "(y,z)\<in> r'"

proof (state)
this:
  (y, z) \<in> r'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<Longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
from assms(2) and this and \<open>z' = (m z)\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  r' = {(x, y). (m x, m y) \<in> r}
  (y, z) \<in> r'
  z' = m z
have "((m y),z') \<in> r"

proof (prove)
using this:
  r' = {(x, y). (m x, m y) \<in> r}
  (y, z) \<in> r'
  z' = m z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (m y, z') \<in> r
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (m y, z') \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<Longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
from this and z'min

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (m y, z') \<in> r
  \<forall>y. (y, z') \<in> r \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> m ` Q
have "(m y) \<notin> ?Q'"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (m y, z') \<in> r
  \<forall>y. (y, z') \<in> r \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> m ` Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m y \<notin> m ` Q
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  m y \<notin> m ` Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<Longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  m y \<notin> m ` Q
show "y\<notin>Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  m y \<notin> m ` Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. y \<notin> Q
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  y \<notin> Q

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q x.
       x \<in> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
from this and \<open>z \<in> Q\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
  z \<in> Q
show "(\<exists>z\<in>Q. \<forall>y. (y,z)\<in> r' --> y\<notin>Q)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
  z \<in> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>z\<in>Q.
       \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>z\<in>Q.
     \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>Q x.
     x \<in> Q \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>z\<in>Q.
         \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf r'
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>Q x.
     x \<in> Q \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>z\<in>Q.
         \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>Q x.
     x \<in> Q \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>z\<in>Q.
         \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf r'
using wf_eq_minimal

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>Q x.
     x \<in> Q \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>z\<in>Q.
         \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> r' \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q)
  wf ?r =
  (\<forall>Q x.
      x \<in> Q \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>z\<in>Q.
          \<forall>y. (y, z) \<in> ?r \<longrightarrow> y \<notin> Q))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf r'
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  wf r'

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma finite_proj_wf:
  assumes "finite E"
  assumes "x \<in> E"
  assumes "acyclic r"
  shows "(\<exists> y. y \<in> E \<and> (\<forall> z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
let ?r = "{ (u,v). (u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u,v) \<in> r) }"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
from assms(1)

proof (chain)
picking this:
  finite E
have "finite (E \<times> E)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finite (E \<times> E)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  finite (E \<times> E)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
have "?r \<subseteq> (E \<times> E)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
    \<subseteq> E \<times> E
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
  \<subseteq> E \<times> E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
have "?r \<subseteq> r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<subseteq> r
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<subseteq> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
from \<open>?r \<subseteq> (E \<times> E)\<close> and \<open>finite (E \<times> E)\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
  \<subseteq> E \<times> E
  finite (E \<times> E)
have "finite ?r"
using finite_subset
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  finite {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
from assms(3) and \<open>?r \<subseteq> r\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  acyclic r
  {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<subseteq> r
have "acyclic ?r"

proof (prove)
using this:
  acyclic r
  {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<subseteq> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. acyclicP
     (\<lambda>u v. u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r)
unfolding acyclic_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x. (x, x) \<notin> r\<^sup>+
  {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<subseteq> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x.
       (x, x)
       \<notin> {(u, v).
                 u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}\<^sup>+
using trancl_mono

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x. (x, x) \<notin> r\<^sup>+
  {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<subseteq> r
  \<lbrakk>?p \<in> ?r\<^sup>+; ?r \<subseteq> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?p \<in> ?s\<^sup>+

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x.
       (x, x)
       \<notin> {(u, v).
                 u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}\<^sup>+
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  acyclicP (\<lambda>u v. u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
from \<open>acyclic ?r\<close> \<open>finite ?r\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  acyclicP (\<lambda>u v. u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r)
  finite {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
have "wf ?r"
using finite_acyclic_wf
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  wf {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
from this assms(2)

proof (chain)
picking this:
  wf {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
  x \<in> E
obtain y where "y \<in> E" and i: "\<And>z. (z, y) \<in> ?r \<Longrightarrow> z \<notin> E"

proof (prove)
using this:
  wf {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
  x \<in> E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>y.
        \<lbrakk>y \<in> E;
         \<And>z.
            (z, y)
            \<in> {(u, v).
                   u \<in> E \<and>
                   v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<Longrightarrow>
            z \<notin> E\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using wfE_min [of "?r" x E]

proof (prove)
using this:
  wf {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
  x \<in> E
  \<lbrakk>wf {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r};
   x \<in> E;
   \<And>z.
      \<lbrakk>z \<in> E;
       \<And>y.
          (y, z)
          \<in> {(u, v).
                 u \<in> E \<and>
                 v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<Longrightarrow>
          y \<notin> E\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>y.
        \<lbrakk>y \<in> E;
         \<And>z.
            (z, y)
            \<in> {(u, v).
                   u \<in> E \<and>
                   v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<Longrightarrow>
            z \<notin> E\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  y \<in> E
  (?z, y)
  \<in> {(u, v).
         u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?z \<notin> E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
have "\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E
proof (rule allI,rule impI)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow> z \<notin> E
fix z

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow> z \<notin> E
assume "(z,y) \<in> r"

proof (state)
this:
  (z, y) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow> z \<notin> E
show "z \<notin> E"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. z \<notin> E
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. z \<in> E \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "z \<in> E"

proof (state)
this:
  z \<in> E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. z \<in> E \<Longrightarrow> False
from this and \<open>y \<in> E\<close> and \<open>(z,y) \<in> r\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  z \<in> E
  y \<in> E
  (z, y) \<in> r
have "(z,y) \<in> ?r"

proof (prove)
using this:
  z \<in> E
  y \<in> E
  (z, y) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (z, y) \<in> {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (z, y) \<in> {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. z \<in> E \<Longrightarrow> False
from this and i [of z] and \<open>z \<in> E\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (z, y) \<in> {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
  (z, y)
  \<in> {(u, v).
         u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<Longrightarrow>
  z \<notin> E
  z \<in> E
show False

proof (prove)
using this:
  (z, y) \<in> {(u, v). u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r}
  (z, y)
  \<in> {(u, v).
         u \<in> E \<and> v \<in> E \<and> (u, v) \<in> r} \<Longrightarrow>
  z \<notin> E
  z \<in> E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  z \<notin> E

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
from this and \<open>y \<in> E\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E
  y \<in> E
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E
  y \<in> E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       y \<in> E \<and>
       (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>y.
     y \<in> E \<and>
     (\<forall>z. (z, y) \<in> r \<longrightarrow> z \<notin> E)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
